column1: #Text=Sokka says : " We do n't have much time .
#Text=" Aang says : " The warden would run away and we 'd steal his keys !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Would n't he just take his keys with him ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm just tossing ideas around .
#Text=" Katara says : " I tried talking the earthbenders into fighting back but , it did n't work !
#Text=If there was just a way to help them help themselves .
#Text=" Sokka says : " For that they 'd need some kind of earth , or some rock .
#Text=" Katara says : " But this entire place is made of metal !
